name: Francesco Sforza
effectDescription: Perform a harvest action at value 1

name: Ludovico Ariosto
effectDescription: You can place your pawn in an occupied action space

name: Filippo Brunelleschi
effectDescription: You don’t have to spend 3 Coins when you place your pawns in a Tower that is already occupied

name: Sigismondo Malatesta
effectDescription: Your uncolored Family Member has an extra value of 3

name: Girolamo Savonarola
effectDescription: You get 1 Faith point

name: Michelangelo Buonarroti
effectDescription: You get 3 Coins

name: Giovanni dalle Bande Nere
effectDescription: You get 1 Wood, 1 Stone and 1 Coin

name: Leonardo da Vinci
effectDescription: Perform a production action at value 0

name: Sandro Botticelli
effectDescription: You get 2 Military points and 1 Victory point

name: Ludovico il Moro
effectDescription: Your colored pawn has a value of 5, regardless of their related dice
requirements: 2 Territory cards, 2 Character cards, 2 Building cards and 2 Venture cards

name: Lucrezia Borgia
effectDescription: Your colored pawns have a extra value of 2
requirements: 6 Territory cards | 6 Character cards | 6 Building cards | 6 Venture cards

name: Federico da Montefeltro
effectDescription: One of your colored pawns has a value of 6, regardless of its related die

name: Lorenzo de’ Medici
effectDescription: Copy the ability of another Leader card already played by another player, Once you decide the ability to copy, it can’t be changed

name: Sisto IV
effectDescription: You gain 5 additional Victory points when you support the Church in a Vatican Report phase

name: Cesare Borgia
effectDescription: You don’t need to satisfy the Military points requirement when you take Territory cards
requirements: 3 Building cards, 12 Coins and 2 Faith points

name: Santa Rita
effectDescription: Each time you receive Wood, Stone, Coins or Servants as an immediate effect from Development cards (not from an action space), you receive the resources twice

name: Cosimo de’ Medici
effectDescription: You get 3 Servants and 1 Victory point

name: Bartolomeo Colleoni
effectDescription: You get 4 Victory points

name: Ludovico III Gonzaga
effectDescription: You get 1 Council's Privilege

name: Pico della Mirandola
effectDescription: When you take Development cards, you get a discount of 3 coins (if the card you are taking has coins in its cost.) This is not a discount on the coins you must spend if you take a Development card from a Tower that’s already occupied
